name: C:/Recall
description:
C:/Remember A new type of horror game...

The room is all you know

The Demon is watching you

Find the path to get out, solve the puzzle, and do not lose your mind.

A text-based interface game with some puzzle room elements. 

THIS GAME IS DIFFICULT, IT WILL TAKE MULTIPLE RESTARTS TO FIGURE OUT

I do not expect many to succeed.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse Click to interact with objects.
  • Keyboard to communicate with the Interface.
  • Enter to submit an answer.
  • Esc or 0 to pause the game, showing the controls in the game.
                                               good luck
